channel.title: My dragon bow hits and dont range?!
channel.description:
Hey!
On my server i have a dragon bow, and the bow has insane range bonus... [img]http://img22.imageshack.us/img22/5661/0014j.png[/img]
but...
when i attack someone with it, i hit like meele and i dont range...
[img]http://img9.imageshack.us/img9/7960/0015e.png[/img]
This is the code from the item.cfg file: [code]item = 8004 Dragon_bow A_Dragon_Bow. 500000 500000 500000 0 0 0 0 455 0 0 0 0 0 0 0[/code]
what do i have to change to make it range ???
Thanks :)

item.title: My dragon bow hits and dont range?!
item.dc:creator: @nicho1995w nicho1995w
item.description:
@nicho1995w wrote:

hyphy ftw:

What i would do is maybe look through your client.java for the msb id and try adding that one to the place’s msb is (Besides spec’s)

how do i do that?
and my bow doesnt have any spec:(

Read full topic
item.source: My dragon bow hits and dont range?!
